content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'kannainput_jithendra231221_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [data_source] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://kannainput@jithendra231221.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE publish.training_set (
	[ID] nvarchar(4000),
	[mmsi] nvarchar(4000),
	[curr_running_timestamp] nvarchar(4000),
	[prev_running_timestamp] nvarchar(4000),
	[running_diff_minutes] float,
	[final_arrival_timestamp] nvarchar(4000),
	[final_arrival_diff_minutes] float,
	[curr_longitude] nvarchar(4000),
	[curr_latitude] nvarchar(4000),
	[end_latitude] nvarchar(4000),
	[end_longitude] nvarchar(4000),
	[SPEED] nvarchar(4000),
	[COURSE] nvarchar(4000),
	[HEADING] nvarchar(4000),
	[TURNRATE] nvarchar(4000),
	[BREADTH] nvarchar(4000),
	[VESSEL_TYPE] nvarchar(4000),
	[VESSEL_MAX_SPEED] nvarchar(4000),
	[DRAFT] nvarchar(4000),
	[POWER] nvarchar(4000),
	[DWT] nvarchar(4000),
	[dq_check] int
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'publish/marine_poc/training_set_json/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = [data_source],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 20 * FROM publish.training_set
GO
